content: good day, does anyone here have a problem in the android and ios app with the video prahravanim, it is not played at all can you advise me what to set when I listen to the video?

@Tuho can you provide more detail on your question? The URL of the video in question might be helpful; I'm also not sure fi you're reporting a Zulip issue or an issue with a link in some Zulip community you participate in.
the video came to my chat from a friend but I can't play it and it was uploaded

Do you mean that we don't preview .mov files that you upload or link to?

That's #9081, which is a feature request we have done some work on (for example #20449), but is not done yet and will not be in 7.0.

good day, I have installed zulip server 7.0 beta 2 still can not play the video, while it was announced that in version 7.0 it will go automatically, can anyone give me info if it is not necessary to reinstall the plugin ?
@Tuho I think you misread the previous message, that change is NOT included in 7.0.
probably yes, and we have some instructions how to install it there and also for video calls
Hello, can anyone advise me how to install video playback support in zulip server? I have zulip server v7

@Tuho: As we've tried to tell you a couple times, that feature is not available in 7.0. There is no way to enable it because it does not exist yet.

You can follow #9081 for updates to know when we implement it.
